metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8012 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: No authentication/authorization is enforced when a server attempts to joina quorum in Apache ZooKeeper before 3.4.10, and 3.5.0-alpha through3.5.3-beta. As a result an arbitrary end point could join the cluster andbegin propagating counterfeit changes to the leader.

criterions.comment: zookeeper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
